DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the management of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation with controlled release flecainide on patient's quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate the Impact of Oral Flecainide on Quality of Life in Patients With Paroxysmal Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: In sinus rhythm at treatment initiation Experienced symptomatic AF episodes Left ventricular ejection fraction of at least 40% Females of child bearing potential must be using reliable method of contraception Intolerance and/or failure of previous therapy with flecainide immediate release Currently receiving >200mg/day flecainide immediate release Severe symptoms during episodes of arrhythmia History of other cardiac conditions/abnormalities Heart surgery within the last 2 months Renal failure Pregnant or lactating females Significant extra cardiac or systemic disease Abnormal electrolyte levels Receiving defined cardiac and/or other treatments
